markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">[Angelic Wings](/Spells.aspx?ID=495)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 403 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Bloodline**
[Angelic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=2)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 3 rounds
</row>

</column>

---

Wings of pure light spread out from your back, granting you a fly Speed equal to your Speed. Your wings cast bright light in a 30-foot radius. When this spell's duration would end, if you're still flying, you float to the ground, as [_feather fall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=111).

---
**Heightened (5th)** The duration increases to 1 minute.
name: Angelic Wings

summary_markdown: Wings of pure light spread out from your back, granting you a fly Speed equal to your Speed.
text: Angelic Wings Source Core Rulebook pg. 403 4.0 Bloodline Angelic Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Duration 3 rounds --- Wings of pure light spread out from your back, granting you a fly Speed equal to your Speed. Your wings cast bright light in a 30-foot radius. When this spell's duration would end, if you're still flying, you float to the ground, as feather fall . --- Heightened (5th) The duration increases to 1 minute.
